attributes.action: Keep Great Britain 100% under the Christian laws upon which it was founded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are against segmenting the country into area of Christian and Sharia Law.
Great Britain was founded upon Christian Laws over the past 2000 years, and should stay that way. If any one chooses to imagrate to another country then they adapt to that countries Laws and traditions.

rejection.details: There are no relevant proposals in existence. We do not accept petitions on hypothetical situations.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
